lead_paragraph: You still see T-shirts around the home of the New England Patriots with coach Bill Belichick's scowling face and the mantra "In Bill We Trust."

headline.print_headline: 2nd-Guessing of Belichick Begins With the Man in the Hoodie
headline.main: 2nd-Guessing of Belichick Begins With the Man in the Hoodie

snippet: You still see T-shirts around the home of the New England Patriots with coach Bill Belichick's scowling face and the mantra "In Bill We Trust."...
